experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.description: 1. Authored integration and unit test cases to gain a deep understanding of the backend of the project, successfully increasing test coverage to 95%.2. Developed datasets using multiple techniques and the labelling tool, ensuring high-quality data for project needs.3. Managed labeling tasks from start to finish, including creating detailed instructions for labelers to ensure accuracy and consistency.4. Conducted person count analysis and validation using the YOLO v5 object detection algorithm, improving the accuracy and reliability of detection models.5. Recognized as team runner-up in Walmart's techathon for developing a computer vision solution to identify damaged pallets in the warehouse.
experience.description_html: 1. Authored integration and unit test cases to gain a deep understanding of the backend of the project, successfully increasing test coverage to 95%.2. Developed datasets using multiple techniques and the labelling tool, ensuring high-quality data for project needs.3. experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: • Used UNet and MultiResUNet models to improve the generalisation and load performance of shopping cart segmentation.• Investigated potential model performance in a wider range of deployment scenarios.• Based on the results, it was determined that a segmentation model was best suited for cart-corral segmentation, whereas an object detection model was best suited for sparsely placed cart detection.
experience.description_html: • Used UNet and MultiResUNet models to improve the generalisation and load performance of shopping cart segmentation.• Investigated potential model performance in a wider range of deployment scenarios.• Based on the results, it was determined that a segmentation model was best suited for cart-corral segmentation, whereas an object detection model was best suited for sparsely placed cart detection. <!---->

experience.title: Python Developer (Machine Learning)
experience.description: • Developed an object detector for classifying different objects using the YOLO algorithm, used an existing pre-trained Keras YOLO model stored in yolo.h5.• Developed a facial recognition system to authenticate the ID of a person using the ideas of FaceNet and DeepFace, acquired an existing pre-trained model minimizing Triplet loss to 528.143.• Structured a baseline model (Emojifier-V1) using word-embedding to find the most appropriate emoji for a sentence, achieved with an accuracy of 0.969.
experience.description_html: • Developed an object detector for classifying different objects using the YOLO algorithm, used an existing pre-trained Keras YOLO model stored in yolo.h5.• Developed a facial recognition system to authenticate the ID of a person using the ideas of FaceNet and DeepFace, acquired an existing pre-trained model minimizing Triplet loss to 528.143.• Structured a baseline model (Emojifier-V1) using word-embedding to find the most appropriate emoji for a sentence, achieved with an accuracy of 0.969.

projects: [{"title":"InShorts NewsApp Clone","description":"InShorts is a news app that selects the latest and best news from multiple national and international sources and summarizes it to present it in short, crisp words.Tech Stacks Used:-• React-Native• API Integration• Android Studio"},{"title":"Dance Academy Site","description":"• Aimed to collect data from users stored in MongoDB Atlas.• Created with HTML, CSS, and Node.js.• Used the Pug template, which compiles to HTML, making code more readable.• Executed Pug's inheritance property, while accessing different pages."},{"title":"ARIMA Time Series Modelling","description":"• Designed an ARIMA model which uses time-series data and statistical analysis to interpret the data and determine the future predicted price of a particular company stock [Hero MotoCorp].• Enhanced the model when keeping the ARIMA parameters (p,d,q) to (3,1,0).• Achieved Symmetric mean absolute percentage error: 5.817."},{"title":"Trajectory Prediction of Nearby Vehicles","description":"• Deployed a trajectory forecasting model which predicts the trajectory/path of nearby vehicles using Convolutional Social Pooling for traffic management.• Handled the technical report for the project."}]
